comments: she means well... knowledgeable yet extremely unorganized. she is a bit of a push over... for example, it was not hard at all to convince her to let our class of 10-15 students to play cards against humanity instead of having class.

tag_professor: Participation matters (6)  Get ready to read (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: CIED 100 is an easy A and Dr. Bushrow has good intentions, however she is not a good professor at all. She\'s extremely unorganized, wastes time in class talking about nothing (yet attendance is counted daily), and takes forever to grade. She\'s nice but her teaching style is frustrating. There are few assignments so just make sure you do them.

tag_professor: Participation matters (6)  Get ready to read (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: She\'s very unclear about everything. she never prepared. don\'t take her if you don\'t have too.

tag_professor: Participation matters (6)  Get ready to read (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Dr. Bushrow is extremely unorganized and unclear. She is constantly changing the schedule and pushing back assignments. Half the time she doesn\'t remember assignments or what she told us last class. She is never prepared and just rambles on about nothing important. She doesn\'t know what she is talking about and you will learn nothing.

tag_professor: Participation matters (6)  Get ready to read (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Dr. Bushrow is very nice but she can\'t keep her own schedule straight and is very unorganized. We spend about 40 minutes of class doing nothing. She talk about unimportant information for long periods of time and important things for 2 minutes, at most. Be prepared to get confused. This class is very frustrating and unclear and will not prepare you

tag_professor: Participation matters (6)  Get ready to read (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Mrs. Bushrow has good intentions but for an entry level class I feel like I have taken away nothing from it. She just gives a lot of busy work and then you never really talk about it.

tag_professor: Participation matters (6)  Get ready to read (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Extremely confusing in explaining everything we did. I constantly had to look around and ask again what we were supposed to be doing because she was not clear. We did not have tests but we had a few assignments that are required for course completion and I was rarely prepared for the assignments. She has good intentions but she is very unclear.

tag_professor: Participation matters (6)  Get ready to read (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: She really does have good intentions, however she\'s very confusing and not very clear. She\'s unclear in her instructions, emails, assignments, due dates, and syllabus. Very hard to understand what is expected of you. I expect a lot more from a college professor.

tag_professor: Participation matters (6)  Get ready to read (4)  Gives good feedback (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: She has a good heart. She is very confusing at times, but she means the best. She dropped our final from 4 lesson plans to 1 plus a paper. She doesn\'t grade until end of Semester class only worth 100 points. She also grades on a check + method. Go to class and you should do fine. She doesn\'t email back right away or even at all.

comments: Dr. Bushrow is a good teacher. At times UNIV 112 felt like I was in preschool. However, class was an easy "A" and not too terrible to get up and go!
